title: Recruitment Consultant
text:
Join Our Team as a Recruitment Consultant in Hull
Are you a self-motivated, results-driven individual with a background in sales or telesales? Academics is seeking a new member to join our thriving Hull Branch as an Educational Recruitment Consultant. While we've been serving local primary and secondary schools for over a decade, we're still growing and have exciting expansion plans on the horizon.
What We Are Looking For:
- Sales Success - If you've excelled in a competitive sales environment, you're the type of person we want on our team.
- No Prior Education Recruitment Experience Needed - Don't worry if you haven't worked in educational recruitment before - we'll provide comprehensive training, mentoring, and coaching on the job.
- Key Skills - Excellent organisational competence, top-notch communication, and strong interpersonal skills are a must.
- A Degree Is a Plus - Whilst not essential, having a degree is an advantage.
- Early Mornings, Office-Based - The role involves early morning starts. typically 7:30am, during term time and is office-based.
Why Academics?
At Academics, we foster career growth and offer excellent rates of pay and on target commission. Our Hull Branch offers a vibrant and supportive work environment. Join us, and you'll be a part of our continued success story.
Next Steps
If you're intrigued by this opportunity, we'd love to hear from you! Reach out to Linda Wright, our Branch Manager, for an informal chat at . Alternatively, you can forward your CV to along with a brief email explaining why this role is a perfect fit for you.
Join Academics in Hull, be part of something exceptional and advance your career and earnings potential!
